title: Kale Zelden on the Gen X Roman Catholic Meaning Crisis
description:
Kale Zelden wrote this haunting piece about the meaning crisis and the Roman Catholic church that he loves. https://onepeterfive.com/things-are-broken-we-need-to-upgrade-our-sense-making-apparatus/ 

It got picked up by Rod Dreher https://www.theamericanconservative.com/dreher/catholicism-intellectual-dark-web-kale-zelden/ 


We sat down for a conversation. 



Kale

Born in New Orleans: Cradel catholic. Married in 1968. Dad was a non-practicing jew. 

Mom is a scripturally soaked Catholic

Also Charismatic

Deeply culturally catholics

Around 16 decided to not be a roman catholic but rolling stone

Late 80s early 90s. Kind of enjoyed leaving the church

RC school was felt-banner, very post council

Sort of a social justice gospel. Do that and not have to wake up on Sundays

Went to LSU, state college

There that he began to really read things

Three authors that jolted him out of his cultural bigotry, Homer, CS Lewis and Augustine

Best friend was an evangelical Christian in a Catholic school. 

Really saved his faith at a crucial moment

"What Homer accomplished in the Iliad has never been topped" really bothered him

Dnesh D'sousa wrote a book "Christian classics" 

Intellectual conversion was all of a piece

https://onepeterfive.com/things-are-broken-we-need-to-upgrade-our-sense-making-apparatus/

Act One Writing for Hollywood, Interdenominational program

Barbara Nicolosi, wrote Fatima

Dreher's Benedict Option

Very mainstream upper eschalon 

Tribe and creed

RC was a real tribal world

Steve Stewart Williams: evolutionary theory book

Vatican 2

John Paul II

Fighting the progressive elements of the Reformers

The TRADs got kicked to the curb

conservative liberals and progressive liberals

Playing the biological options

It's weird that Barron is a Bishop

McCarrok was a creature of the system

Political reality of the church

JPII in the chair. 

Barron is a conservative liberal, not a trad

Trads have figured out Youtube

Jordan Peterson

What does it mean to be a RC with zero faith in the institutional church

eric Weinstein

Tom Holland

Ricour's concept of the second naivete 

Gen Xer has inherited modernity and not tradition

MTD before it had a title
